Header: Gamperaliya Program with a renewed vigor
Content: Minister Gayantha Karunatilake says steps have been taken to take forward the Gamperaliya Program with a renewed vigor. The Minister said this while attending a function to distribute self-employment assistance to 96 Samurdhi recipients in the Bentota Divisional Secretariat Area. The self-employment equipment was distributed under the livelihood program of the Samurdhi Development Department. The value of the equipment is more than 2.5 million rupees. Southern Provincial Councilor Jayasiri Nanayakkara, Bentota Divisional Secretary Wasantha Vithanage and a group of people were present on the occasion.
